languages.text: "Машиновидцы в смятении. Они говорят, что это — дар, проистекающий из мудрости Омниссии, но образ его был ошибочен, а потому подвергся эрозии скверны и неверия. Что бы это ни значило... Малый корабельный конклав погрузился в инфомедитацию, чтобы составить декрет о допустимости использования данного предмета".

"The Enginseers are at a loss. They say it's a gift born from the Omnissiah's wisdom, but its image was imperfect, and therefore it was eroded by corruption and unbelief — whatever that means... The ship's minor conclave has gone into datameditation to produce a resolution regarding the admissibility of using this item."
languages.original_text: "Машиновидцы в смятении. Они говорят, что это — дар, проистекающий из мудрости Омниссии, но образ его был ошибочен, а потому подвергся эрозии скверны и неверия. Что бы это ни значило... Малый корабельный конклав погрузился в инфомедитацию, чтобы составить декрет о допустимости использования данного предмета".

traits.locale_text: "Enginseers are in turmoil. They say this is a gift born from the Omnissiah's wisdom, but its image was false, and therefore it was eroded by filth and disbelief, whatever it means... The minor naval conclave entered the state of infomeditation to come up with a decree regarding admissibility of using this item."

"Enginseers are in turmoil. They say this is a gift born from the Omnissiah's wisdom, but its image was false, and therefore it was eroded by filth and disbelief, whatever it means... The minor naval conclave entered the state of infomeditation to come up with a decree regarding admissibility of using this item."

"The enginseers are discombobulated. They say, this is a gift born from the Omnissiah's wisdom, but its image was imperfect, and therefore it was eroded by filth and disbelief, whatever it may mean... The minor naval conclave entered the state of infomeditation to produce a decree regarding the admissibility of using this item."

"The enginseers are discombobulated. They say, this is a gift born from the Omnissiah's wisdom, but its image was imperfect, and therefore it was eroded by filth and disbelief, whatever it may mean... The minor naval conclave entered the state of infomeditation to produce a decree regarding the admissibility of using this item."

"The Enginseers are at a loss. They say it's a gift born from the Omnissiah's wisdom, but its image was imperfect, and therefore it was eroded by corruption and unbelief — whatever that means... The ship's minor conclave has gone into datameditation to produce a resolution regarding the admissibility of using this item."

languages.text: “所有技术人员都不知所措。他们说，这件礼物源自欧姆尼塞亚的智慧，但它的形态并不完美，因此可能遭到了腐化与异端的玷污——天知道这些话是什么意思……总之，所有低阶技术人员都进入了技术冥想状态，准备拟定关于使用这件技术造物的相关规定。”
languages.original_text: "The Enginseers are at a loss. They say it's a gift born from the Omnissiah's wisdom, but its image was imperfect, and therefore it was eroded by corruption and unbelief — whatever that means... The ship's minor conclave has gone into datameditation to produce a resolution regarding the admissibility of using this item."

traits.locale_text: “所有技术人员都不知所措。他们说，这件礼物源自欧姆尼塞亚的智慧，但它的形态并不完美，因此可能遭到了腐化与异端的玷污——天知道这些话是什么意思……总之，所有低阶技术人员都进入了技术冥想状态，准备拟定关于使用这件技术造物的相关规定。”

languages.text: « Les technaugures sont perplexes. Ils affirment qu'il s'agit d'un don né de la sagesse de l'Omnimessie, mais que son image était imparfaite et que, par conséquent, elle a été rongée par la corruption et l'incroyance... quoi que cela puisse signifier. Le conclave mineur du vaisseau est entré en infoméditation afin de statuer quant à l'admissibilité de l'utilisation de cet objet. »
languages.original_text: "The Enginseers are at a loss. They say it's a gift born from the Omnissiah's wisdom, but its image was imperfect, and therefore it was eroded by corruption and unbelief — whatever that means... The ship's minor conclave has gone into datameditation to produce a resolution regarding the admissibility of using this item."

traits.locale_text: « Les technaugures sont perplexes. Ils affirment qu'il s'agit d'un don né de la sagesse de l'Omnimessie, mais que son image était imparfaite et que, par conséquent, elle a été rongée par la corruption et l'incroyance... quoi que cela puisse signifier. Le conclave mineur du vaisseau est entré en infoméditation afin de statuer quant à l'admissibilité de l'utilisation de cet objet. »

languages.text: "Die Maschinenseher sind ratlos. Sie sagen, sie sei eine Gabe, geboren aus der Weisheit des Omnissiah. Ihr Abbild aber war unvollkommen und wurde daher von Schmutz und Unglauben erodiert, was auch immer das bedeuten mag ... Das kleine Konklave des Schiffs ist in einen Zustand der Datenmeditation getreten, um einen Erlass über die Zulässigkeit der Verwendung dieses Gegenstands herauszugeben."
languages.original_text: "The Enginseers are at a loss. They say it's a gift born from the Omnissiah's wisdom, but its image was imperfect, and therefore it was eroded by corruption and unbelief — whatever that means... The ship's minor conclave has gone into datameditation to produce a resolution regarding the admissibility of using this item."

traits.locale_text: "Die Maschinenseher sind ratlos. Sie sagen, sie sei eine Gabe, geboren aus der Weisheit des Omnissiah. Ihr Abbild aber war unvollkommen und wurde daher von Schmutz und Unglauben erodiert, was auch immer das bedeuten mag ... Das kleine Konklave des Schiffs ist in einen Zustand der Datenmeditation getreten, um einen Erlass über die Zulässigkeit der Verwendung dieses Gegenstands herauszugeben."

languages.text: «Los visioingenieros están perplejos. Dicen que es un regalo, fruto de la sabiduría del Omnissiah, pero su imagen era imperfecta y, por lo tanto, la corrupción y la incredulidad la han erosionado, sea lo que sea que quieran decir con eso... El cónclave menor de la nave ha entrado en el estado de meditación de datos a fin de pronunciarse sobre la permisividad del uso de este objeto».
languages.original_text: "The Enginseers are at a loss. They say it's a gift born from the Omnissiah's wisdom, but its image was imperfect, and therefore it was eroded by corruption and unbelief — whatever that means... The ship's minor conclave has gone into datameditation to produce a resolution regarding the admissibility of using this item."

traits.locale_text: «Los visioingenieros están perplejos. Dicen que es un regalo, fruto de la sabiduría del Omnissiah, pero su imagen era imperfecta y, por lo tanto, la corrupción y la incredulidad la han erosionado, sea lo que sea que quieran decir con eso... El cónclave menor de la nave ha entrado en el estado de meditación de datos a fin de pronunciarse sobre la permisividad del uso de este objeto».

languages.text: 「機関整備師たちは狼狽している。彼らが言うのは、これは万機神の叡智から生まれた賜物だが、そのイメージは不完全であったため、汚物や不信心によって侵食されたのだ…それがどのような意味かはここでは省くが…海軍小規模秘密会議は、このアイテムの使用可否に関する法令を作成するため、データメディテーション状態に入った」
languages.original_text: "The Enginseers are at a loss. They say it's a gift born from the Omnissiah's wisdom, but its image was imperfect, and therefore it was eroded by corruption and unbelief — whatever that means... The ship's minor conclave has gone into datameditation to produce a resolution regarding the admissibility of using this item."

traits.locale_text: 「機関整備師たちは狼狽している。彼らが言うのは、これは万機神の叡智から生まれた賜物だが、そのイメージは不完全であったため、汚物や不信心によって侵食されたのだ…それがどのような意味かはここでは省くが…海軍小規模秘密会議は、このアイテムの使用可否に関する法令を作成するため、データメディテーション状態に入った」

languages.text: "Mühedyumlar da şaşıp kaldı. Hermesih'in irfanından doğmuş bir armağan olduğunu düşünüyorlar. Lakin sureti kusurluymuş, bu yüzden yozlaşıp kâfirleşmiş... Artık ne demekse o. Geminin küçük meclisi, armağanı kullanmanızın uygun olup olmayacağını belirlemek için veri meditasyonuna başladı."
languages.original_text: "The Enginseers are at a loss. They say it's a gift born from the Omnissiah's wisdom, but its image was imperfect, and therefore it was eroded by corruption and unbelief — whatever that means... The ship's minor conclave has gone into datameditation to produce a resolution regarding the admissibility of using this item."
